title: Himi 335
lyrics:
6-8’s
1.
Sīsū ko hoku sino ni,
Pea mo e laumālie;
‘A ia na’a ke huhu’i,
‘Oku ou ‘atu ni ma’au,
Mo ‘eku mo’ui foki,
Ke ke fa’iteliha ki ai.
2.
Pea kapau ‘e manuki
‘E he kakai kiate au,
Pe fai ha fakamamahi,
Ko e me’a ‘i he ngāue,
Ke ke ‘iate au,’Eiki,
Pea u fiemālie ai.
3.
Pea ‘e lelei fulipē,
‘A e me’a kehekehe,
Lelei pē ‘a e manuki,
Lelei mo hoku tautea,
Ta’ofi pē, ‘a ho houhau,
Pea ‘e lelei fulipē. *
